title: Lawfully Screwed
description: Prominent divorce attorney. Ladies’ man. Sex Addict. All of that describes Mason Carter to a T.When a few raunchy, high-profile scandals land him in hot water, his father offers him two options—rehab for his addiction or forget about taking over the family law firm.His decision made, Mason figures one last fling wouldn’t hurt. He figured wrong.The high-priced escort he hires for the night is a blast from his past—the one woman he can’t get out of his mind, even eleven years after he last saw her. When a new client strikes a match against his rekindled romance and secrets are revealed, Mason’s left in a tough position—win the client's case or protect the woman he loves. Either way, he’s lawfully screwed.
author: Victoria Bright
